notes.weekFocus: Peak Development with Outdoor Transition Preparation
notes.specialConsiderations: Tuesday pickleball league, outdoor transition potential, building on strong Week 22 performance

notes: Use bolster or rolled towel under spine

workouts.name: Evening Pickleball League
notes: Brief warmup for shoulders and hips

workouts.name: Full Body Strength with Power Development

notes: Light jogging or skipping in place

workouts.name: Lactate Shuttle Development
notes: Focus on controlled transition between intensities
Higher cadence during Part B segments aids lactate clearance
This workout develops lactate processing capacity

workouts.name: Mountain Simulation Long Climb
notes: Simulate real mountain climbing with sustained efforts
Lower cadence during climbs, higher during descents
Focus on steady power output during climbing segments

workouts.name: Micro-Interval Development
notes: Focus on quick transitions between high and low power
This workout simulates terrain changes on gravel rides
Develops neuromuscular power and quick recovery
